name: Games for Toddlers 2
description:
Each game is simple and uses only the touch screen.

Egg Shakers: A simple and engaging rhythmic game.

Pet Sitter: A simplified pet simulator featuring a cute cat.

Kids Xylophone: The children's version of the iconic musical instrument.

Wooden Blocks: The video game version of classic wooden stacking blocks.
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
